title: Probability - Sasha traffic delay by day

content.question: (a) For the next 21 days that Sasha travels to work, what is the probability that Sasha will experience a delay due to traffic on at least 3 of the days? (b) What is the probability that Sasha’s first delay due to traffic will occur after the fifth day of travel to work? (c) Consider a random sample of 21 days that Sasha will travel to work. For the proportion of those days that she will experience a delay due to traffic, is the sampling distribution of the sample proportion approximately normal? Justify your answer.
